english.segment1: Without a doubt I've taken all you can give. And now I suffer through this song. Feel free to hum along
english.segment2: Going back a few short years I can see. That I was never really here. As I collect the facts and sort them in rows. It seems the question's always been. How long can I keep this going?
english.segment3: You can use it against me. In your saddest state of mind. Use it against me. With my ego on the line. Use it againse me anytime
english.segment4: I try to simplify the plot to an outline. But I can never make the end. I want to read some lines that stray from the screenplay. Improvisation's never been. Something I can keep going
english.segment5: You can use it against me. In your saddest state of mind. Use it against me. With my ego on the line. Use it against me
english.segment6: I've never preached a single word. That doesn't sound absurd. I don't know how to pound it in. To make it stick under my skin
english.segment7: You can use it againse me. In your saddest state of mind. Use it against me. With my ego on the line. Use it against me anytime
